description.@en: With but a touch of your hand, objects are made to wither and become brittle.

data.distance: Any one object or person you can touch

criticalFailure.@en: This dark Magick withers both yourself and your possessions. Two random trappings of your own are instantly destroyed and you are aged [[/roll 1D10+1]] in years. Your Agility and Brawn Primary Attributes are reduced by the same number of years that you age.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, it immediately renders inorganic objects to dust, left destroyed.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch must Resist with a successful Coordination Test or age [[/roll 1D10+1]] years. Their Agility and Brawn Primary Attributes are reduced by the same number of that they age. If this Magick is used on inorganic objects smaller than a sword, it can permanently splinter, shatter and rust objects, making them have the Ruined! Quality. When you touch organic objects such as food, it immediately spoils, swarming with maggots and bot flies.

reagents.@en: A bad apple writhing with maggots, crushed under heel (expended)
